reference.shortdesc: You need the following items to complete the task of applying toothpaste to a toothbrush:

ul.li: Toothpaste – special paste for cleaning teeth, locked in a toothpaste tube.
Toothpaste tube – tube-like packaging, flattened on one side and with a hole opening, covered by a screw-on cap, on the other, containing toothpaste.
Toothbrush – an elongated stick, usually with a non-slip grip on one side and a small brush on the other, together with toothpaste used for cleaning teeth.
